select i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.bnd_settype as 结算方式, case when right.u_i_code is not null then right.u_i_code else tr.i_code end as 费用代码, tr.i_name as 费用名称, tr.setdate as 结算日期, tr.orddate as 交易日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 总应计利息, tr.operator as 执行人, tr.trader as 交易确认人, tr.intordid as 成交单编号 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join TTRD_INSTRUMENT right on tr.i_code = right.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type
where tr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId} and tr.ref_sysordid is null
